name: A Forgery of Light and Dark
name_original: A Forgery of Light and Dark
description:
Control light and dark in this fast-paced paint-em-up puzzler!

You are an art forger whose job is to copy the works of others and sell them off for a profit! With your earnings, you can purchase upgrades to make your job easier. Using only two colors - light and dark- as well as the humble square and the modest circle, you will create (or imitate) true masterpieces of our time!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Sorry for no tutorial! Click on the paint buckets to choose whether to paint with the circle or square tool, or use the X and C keys respectively. Drawing a shape inverts whatever is behind it, use this to save time when drawing!

You need to purchase the undo upgrade from the store (pull down on the tab thingy). Then you can undo/redo with the button or CTRL+Z.

Made for YeegJam V.
